welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Elk Plain, a charming city known for its picturesque nature and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and explore all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at McChord AFB Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at McChord AFB Airport is used exclusively for military flights and operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Olympia Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Olympia Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Seattle-Tacoma International Airport is where most passengers will arrive and depart from. It offers a variety of dining and shopping options, as well as services such as currency exchange and baggage storage.

terminals.name: North Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The North Satellite Terminal at Seattle-Tacoma International Airport primarily serves Alaska Airlines and its partners. It offers a smaller selection of dining and shopping options compared to the main terminal, but is still convenient for those traveling with Alaska Airlines.

terminals.name: South Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The South Satellite Terminal at Seattle-Tacoma International Airport serves international flights and some domestic flights. It offers a variety of dining and shopping options, as well as amenities such as a children's play area and a yoga room.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and follow the prompts to access the internet.
